newsitem.title: USA: Ecolab to expand headquarters, add jobs.
newsitem.headline: Ecolab to expand headquarters, add jobs.

text.p: Ecolab Inc said Monday it would spend $12 million to expand its headquarters here and add as many as 600 jobs to its payroll.
The company currently occupies two buildings in downtown St. Paul. Ecolab plans to lease an adjacent building and create Ecolab University, a training center that will support all of its divisions.
Ecolab develops cleaning, sanitizing and maintenance products for the hospitality and industrial markets. The company posted sales of $2.2 billion in 1995.
Ecolab shares were unchanged Monday at 38.
